title: Nami the Nami-tee sculpted in 3d
body:
I'm teaching myself the Zbrush and this is my first project I actually finished (Katarina will forever be at 80% until I get motivation).
This is very high poly. I kept it low poly where possible (Tail, etc), but because I know just a little bit less than nothing about rendering engines, the only program I am truly comfortable with for renders is poser so.... Stuff like the fur, water, etc, got exported as way higher poly than it needed to be but, it looks good, didn't kill my PC, and rendered in less than 2 hours so, we're good.
It took a total of about 40 hours, not because it should have, but because I just started learning Zbrush so there were many "i can do that better's". Once I was satisfied with each piece I exported them as OBJ files to poser and created dynamic clothing for a base model. The base human model was then exported to Zbrush and I assigned many.. many morph's to import back into Poser so she looks like a Nami and not like a genderless mannequin.
Anyway, I like her, there are things I want to change but I'm really just sick of looking at it by now so, I hope you like my Nami-Tee.
Sculpted in Zbrush Textured in Zbrush/Photoshop Rendered in Poser 2014 using Firefly
Final render is 9000x9000 300DPI and took around 2 hours.
~~~~~~~~~~~~
Here's the same image on a grey background so you can see a bit better.
http://i.imgur.com/IgmIlXd.jpg [2]
Wallpaper Sized: http://i.imgur.com/y5ngHYY.jpg [3]
~~~~~~~~~~~~
(I did Janna too from way back when, here she is: http://i.imgur.com/cWtk5jO.png )

replies.body:
That is amazing >:O

I'm glad people really 'got' the joke with Nami being Urf's number 1 fan and cosplaying as him. I imagine as a young kipper she had posters of Urf on her walls and would tweet nasty comments to anyone Urf was publicly seen with.

Love that Janna too - those boots... I want.
Did you post this on the [URF community creations](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/NX0hH4vb) thread?
I didn't even know about it!   I just did, thanks so much :)
How the heck can people be so good at this ._.

That Janna face makes me remember an actress.. but I can't remember her name now
Great job btw
